wordpressPost.title: A few day tickets for sale at the entrance
wordpressPost.content:
There is one last chance to get day passes to this year’s Øya. A a small number of tickets will be on sale at the entrance to the festival from Wednesday to Saturday (only tickets for the same day). The price will be NOK 750, -.

We hope this can be a small contribution to stop some of the illegal black market. The Øya Festival wants to remind you that only tickets purchased from the festival or Billettservice (our official ticket partner), are guaranteed to be valid tickets for the festival. We therefore warn anyone against buying tickets elsewhere.

Day tickets are sold from 11.00 the on same day, at the ticket office outside the Medieval Park. There will beat least 50 tickets each day and each person will be able to purchase a maximum of two tickets.

The festival area is open to the public:

Wednesday, Thursday and Friday: 1:00 p.m. to 11:00 p.m. (entrance closes 22:00)

Saturday: 12.00-23.00 (entrance closes 22:00)

Photo: Siv Randi Vinsrygg
